mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM board WHERE code = 4 AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.code, b.user_id, u.email, b.created_at, (r.id IS NOT NULL) AS reply, r.created_at AS reply_created_at FROM board AS b LEFT JOIN reply AS r ON r.board_id = b.id JOIN user AS u ON u.id = b.user_id WHERE b.code = 4 LIMIT #{start}, 5

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.code, b.user_id, u.email, b.created_at, (r.id IS NOT NULL) AS reply, r.created_at AS reply_created_at FROM board AS b LEFT JOIN reply AS r ON r.board_id = b.id JOIN user AS u ON u.id = b.user_id WHERE b.code = 4 AND b.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') LIMIT #{pageVO.start}, 5

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.code, b.user_id, u.email, b.created_at, r.id AS replyId, r.content AS reply_content, r.created_at AS reply_created_at FROM board AS b LEFT JOIN reply AS r ON r.board_id = b.id JOIN user AS u ON u.id = b.user_id WHERE b.code = 4 AND b.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply SET board_id = #{boardId}, content = #{replyContent}, created_at = NOW()
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE code = 4 AND id = #{id}
